title: Requiring the Speaker of the Assembly to appoint a two person committee to inform the Senate of the election of Sheldon Silver as Speaker of the Assembly
fulltext:
ASSEMBLY  RESOLUTION  establishing  a  committee of the Assembly to wait
upon the Senate

RESOLVED, That a committee of two be appointed by the  Speaker  to  wait
upon  the  Senate and inform that body of the election of Sheldon Silver
as Speaker of the Assembly and that the Assembly is organized and  ready
to proceed with business.
